actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to require the Office of Management and Budget to monitor all federally funded building construction projects and report to the President and Congress quarterly on any such project that is behind its construction completion schedules.

summary.text: Requires the Director of the Office of Management and Budget to monitor all federally funded building construction projects and report to the President and the Congress quarterly on any such project that is behind schedule.

titles.title: A bill to require the Office of Management and Budget to monitor all federally funded building construction projects and report to the President and Congress quarterly on any such project that is behind its construction completion schedules.
